examples.example: 哪怕只有一毫米的进步，我也会感到十分开心和满足。

translate.english: Even if there is only one millimeter of progress, I will also feel very happy and satisfied.

examples.example: 只要每天努力一毫米，未来就会前进一大步。

translate.english: As long as you work hard one millimeter every day, the future will move forward a big step.

examples.example: 即使是一毫米的距离，只要坚持，也能最终抵达梦想的彼岸。

translate.english: Even if it is a millimeter of distance, as long as one persists, one can eventually reach the other side of the dream.
